## ILinkableBinder interface

An automatically sharable binder.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ILinkableBinder<TComponentRenderer extends TUnknownComponentRenderer> extends IBinder<TComponentRenderer> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [IBinder](./core.ibinder.md)<!-- -->&lt;TComponentRenderer&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [linkId](./core.ilinkablebinder.linkid.md) | string \| symbol | A unique identifier for this class of linkable binder. The binders must have the same buffer format / layout. |
